animt.cmd.frames: Set the amount of frames to %s
animt.cmd.gif_size: Set the size of image to %sx%s
animt.cmd.trans: Set the transparency of image to %s
animt.cmd.item_delta: Set the offset of the mob in image to: [x: %s, y: %s]
animt.cmd.load_config.failed: Failed to load config file: %s, it may be not exist
